mapper.select:
SELECT SP_NUM, SP_NAME, SP_KOR_POINT, SP_ENG_POINT, SP_MATH_POINT, SP_PROFILE FROM STUDENT_POINT
AND SP_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{spName},'%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STUDENT_POINT (SP_NAME, SP_KOR_POINT, SP_ENG_POINT, SP_MATH_POINT, SP_PROFILE) VALUES(#{spName},#{spKorPoint},#{spEngPoint},#{spMathPoint},#{spProfile})
mapper.update: UPDATE STUDENT_POINT SET SP_NAME=#{spName}, SP_KOR_POINT=#{spKorPoint}, SP_ENG_POINT=#{spEngPoint}, SP_MATH_POINT=#{spMathPoint}, SP_PROFILE=#{spProfile} WHERE SP_NUM=#{spNum}
